author: Mohamed Oumoumad
description: Creates a plain solid color image at the desired size and format, requires imagemagick, it is provided in libs/ but can also be downloaded here : http://imagemagick.org/script/download.php make sure to enable legacy commands like (convert etc) while installing.

params.name: magick executer
params.tooltip: the path to your magick executable, if you already have it in your PATH environement variable, then just put 'magick', if left empty the one in libs/ will be used

params.name: Use selected image size
params.tooltip: When checked the size of the selected image will be used

params.name: Size
params.tooltip: input height and width (ex : 1920x1080), this will be ignored if 'use selected image size' is checked

params.name: Format
params.tooltip: choose the file format you want the solid color image to be

params.name: Output name
params.tooltip: input the file name, if left empty the solid will be named like this : color_solid (ex : red_solid)

params.name: Output directory
params.tooltip: you can specify a directory, if left empty the file will be at directory where you execute the script
